jigl.image
Class RealGrayImage

java.lang.Object
  jigl.image.RealGrayImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Image
Direct Known Subclasses:
ImageKernel
public class RealGrayImage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Image

RealGrayImage is a 2-d array of floats
